  • Constructor Details

    • Card_AbandonedShip

      public Card_AbandonedShip(int id, String cardName, int cardLevel, boolean isTest, int flightDaysPenalty, int crewNumberPenalty, int moneyEarned) throws Exception
      Constructor for the Card_AbandonedShip class, representing an abandoned ship card in the game. This card introduces penalties and rewards to the players during its activation phase, such as flight days penalty, crew number penalty, and money earned. The initial state of the card is set to the "AbandonedShipPreparation" phase.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the card.
      cardName - the name of the card.
      cardLevel - the level of the card.
      isTest - a boolean indicating whether this instance is a test card.
      flightDaysPenalty - the penalty in terms of flight days associated with the card.
      crewNumberPenalty - the penalty in terms of crew members associated with the card.
      moneyEarned - the amount of money players can earn from the card.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the card initialization process.

    • nextPhase

      public void nextPhase(Player p, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> posPers) throws Exception
      Transitions the current state of the card to the next phase of the abandoned ship process. The next state is determined by the current state's transition logic. Additionally, this method activates the new state for the given player and position data.
      Parameters:
      p - the player who is interacting with the card during this state transition
      posPers - a nested list of integers representing position and personnel data related to the card's state
      Throws:
      Exception - if issues arise during the state transition or activation process

    • setState

      public void setState(AbandonedShipState state) throws RuntimeException
      Sets the current state of the card to the provided AbandonedShipState. This method updates the internal state used to manage the card's lifecycle and behavior.
      Parameters:
      state - the new state to set for this card. Must be a valid instance of AbandonedShipState.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the provided state is null or an invalid transition occurs.
